title: PRESIDENT’S NEW YEAR MESSAGE; WE LOOK TOWARDS THE FUTURE WITH POSITIVE ASPIRATIONS
content: We look towards the future at the dawn of this New Year with renewed determination, firm commitment and many positive expectations, he said adding, ‘Our aim is to recover with speed all that was lost to Sri Lankan society in more than three decades’, stated President Mahinda Rajapaksa in his New Year message. With great…
